com.canabang.genietext.transit.model.processor.dbase
Class TransitService

java.lang.Object
  com.canabang.genietext.transit.model.processor.dbase.TransitService

public class TransitService
extends Object

A simulator for a transit service database. Every transit service database has a collection of buses and their respective schedules for certain locations they stop at.

Version:
1.00 2009-05-31 Initial submission.
Author:
rhaq

Method Detail

getScheduleTimes

public TreeSet<TransitTime> getScheduleTimes(Bus b,
                                             int schedule)
Gets the schedule data associated with the specified bus for the specified schedule key.

Parameters:
b - The bus to locate the schedule for.
schedule - The schedule key to locate which day to retrieve the schedule information for.
Returns:
A set of times associated with the specified bus for the specified schedule key.

reverseLocationLookup

public Set<Station> reverseLocationLookup(Intersection i)
Retrieves a set of stops that are available at the specified location.

Parameters:
i - The location that contains potential stops.
Returns:
The set of stops that are available at the specified location.

reverseStopLookup

public Set<Bus> reverseStopLookup(int stop)
Retrieves a set of buses that stop at the specified stop number.

Parameters:
stop - The stop number that potentially contains a set of buses associated with it.
Returns:
The set of stops that are available at the specified stop.

getInstance

public static TransitService getInstance()
                                  throws ParserConfigurationException,
                                         SAXException,
                                         IOException
Retrieves a single instance of this class.

Returns:
A single instance of this class.
Throws:
ParserConfigurationException - If there is any problem setting up the XML parser.
SAXException - If there are any problems parsing the XML file associated with the transit service.
IOException - If there is a problem accessing the resource file for the transit service.
